attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Lisbon Treaty states the treaty MUST be ratified by all members of the E U, if it is not it cannot proceed.

The Irish have refused to ratify it, you know very well that if a referendum is held in Great Britain, again it will be refused.

You, as unelected prime minister have no right to refuse to hold a referendum as it was promised in your party's 1995 election campaign. If you will not hold such a referendum, we, and many others will demand your removal from office for your breach of faith. What you are doing is treasonous and we will pursue the matter in law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
